verbs.description: [ARG1: israeli teen] [V: falls] [ARG4: to his death] [ARGM-TMP: while taking a selfie in yosemite] an israeli teenager reportedly slipped and fell of a cliff and died while taking a selfie at yosemite national park on wednesday israel foreign ministry confirmed to the times of israel israel tomer frankfurter yosemite new south wales half dome peak israels foreign ministry yosemite national park
